definition: to enter/to go into/to join/to become a member of/to confirm or agree with/abbr. for 入聲|入声[ru4 sheng1]
When you enter a country, enquire about the local customs (idiom); do as the natives do/When in Rome, do as the Romans do
When you enter a country, follow the local customs (idiom); do as the natives do/When in Rome, do as the Romans do

pinyin: chu1 ru4 jing4 jian3 yan4 jian3 yi4 ju2
Chu1 ru4 Jing4 Guan3 li3 ju2

sentences.english: May I have your passport and arrival card, please?
sentences.chinese: 请出示您的护照和入境卡？

sentences.english: Yes, Passport and the disembarkation card, please.
sentences.chinese: 是的，请给我护照，以及旅客入境登记表。

sentences.english: Objective The conditions of Ceratopogonidae carried by entry international ocean ships were determined.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解入境国际航行船舶携带输入性蠓类的情况。

sentences.english: K3 Do you intend to marry within three months of your arrival in New Zealand?
sentences.chinese: 你是否打算在入境新西兰三个月内结婚？

sentences.english: But when you go to the United States, you had better "do as the Romans do."
sentences.chinese: 若你们去美国，最好还是“入境随俗”。

sentences.english: To undertake the other tasks as assigned by HeNan Entry-exit Inspection & Quarantine Bureau.
sentences.chinese: 承办河南出入境检验检疫局交办的其他工作。

sentences.english: Must I go to the immigration control office?
sentences.chinese: 我必须要到入境管理处吗？

sentences.english: Please fill in the arrival and departure cards.
sentences.chinese: 请填写入境卡和出境卡。

sentences.english: Please fill in the disembarkation card and the Baggage Declaration Form.
sentences.chinese: 对不起。请教我怎么填写这张入境卡好吗？

sentences.english: Her bags were examined when she entered the country.
sentences.chinese: 入境时她的提包被检查了。

sentences.english: I linger in front of an immigration officer with a sycophantic look on my face.
sentences.chinese: 我带着谄媚的表情在一间入境办公室门前徘徊着。

sentences.english: We are up to our knees with applications for entry visa.
sentences.chinese: 我们收到很多很多要求入境签证的申请书。

sentences.english: Second, strengthen advocation to improve travelers' awareness and capacity of disease prevention.
sentences.chinese: 加大宣传力度，提高出入境人员的防病意识和能力。

sentences.english: The authorities deported her for illegal entry.
sentences.chinese: 当局以她非法入境为由将她驱逐出境。

sentences.english: Bill Berger leads the U.S. Disaster Assistance Response Team, whose members are waiting for visas in Bangkok.
sentences.chinese: 美国救灾应急小组的成员正在曼谷等待入境签证。

sentences.english: The Immigration Department is tasked to exercise these functions.
sentences.chinese: 入境事务处负责执行上述职务。

definition: to leave a country or region/outbound (tourism)
to repatriate (e.g. prisoners of war)/to send back
the Schengen area, a passport-free zone in Europe
